name: Jack and Triangle
description:
Small puzzle platformer I made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. 

Basically made for a learning experience, not really fun or polished at all, expect a number of bugs.

I had to remove the ingame tutorials because of some UI issues I ran into so here are the controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrows to Move

J to Jump

L to Switch Characters

K to perform Action with Jack
